projects.title: DJ Management Platform
projects.problem: Event operations were fragmented, making financial control, scheduling, recurrence analysis, and contact management difficult.
projects.solution: Built a platform with structured event records, Google Maps integration for location data, detailed financial tracking, YouTube API metrics, and a Kanban workflow for video operations.
projects.impact: Centralized operational and financial data into one system, improving visibility and execution quality.

projects.title: OdontoMidWeb
projects.problem: The previous pricing solution for dental clinics was spreadsheet-based with limited structure and user guidance.
projects.solution: Rebuilt the experience as a web app with guided input flow, scenario comparison, dashboards, spreadsheet import/export, and protected fields to reduce user errors.
projects.impact: Increased product value perception and enabled more data-driven pricing decisions.
projects.visibilityNote: Commercial product: public usage and demo access are not available.
